IoT Security Solutions

We act as extensions of your team offering deep security expertise

Gain confidence that your place in the next wave of innovation is secured

Internet of Things

Get assurance that your Internet of Things devices, data, and services are secure.

SaaS Applications

We help product teams focus on innovation by solving their complex security challenges.

Mobile Applications

Develop, launch and maintain secure mobile apps faster and more efficiently.

Cloud Infrastructure

Effectively navigate today's shared security responsibility model in the cloud.

Corporate Infrastructure

Simulate high-impact security breaches to better understand real enterprise security risks.

Critical Infrastructure

Identify risk and strengthen controls in place to fortify critical infrastructure cybersecurity.

Delivering on-going, comprehensive, and efficient security testing coverage

As an alternative to providing clients a security evaluation that represents a single, snapshot in time, Diana’s subscription model offers holistic, continuous security analysis. Using multiple analysis methods and machine learning techniques to identify new vulnerabilities introduced by incremental code movement, Diana is designed to provide customers with on-going, comprehensive, and efficient security testing coverage.
Built on expertise, engineered to scale, and unified through software.
Track vulnerabilities to closure across lifecycle
Benchmark results over time across product portfolio
Machine learning aided vulnerability identification
Automated analysis through continuous testing
Integrate with 3rd-party bug tracking software
Professional analysis through trusted expertise
Learn more
